turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor matematik problemini yapsam çok mutlu olurdum.
english_example_sentence: If I were to do this difficult math problem, I would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я сделал эту сложную математическую задачу, я был бы очень счастлив.
